name: Sunstone Seekers
description:
Gather your team, experience challenging fights, and gain new abilities in Sunstone Seekers.

This is a turn-based tactical rougelike I'm working on in my spare time, drawing a lot of inspiration from Slay The Spire, Banner Saga, Final Fantasy Tactics but also Dungeons and Dragons.

Right now, the game is in early development, and so it's a great moment for you to check it out, be part of the community from the very beginning and help to make the game the best it can get!

I may remove this demo at some point, but if you want to playtest further and get to see more awesome content, join the Sunseeker Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/mVrHpxUYFa
